title: All This for What? by TheJesseClark
description:
The horrors of combat never changes and here we see the horrors that go into it... the dark gory horror. Why are we still here... just to suffer?

The Author: https://www.reddit.com/user/TheJesseClark/posts/
Video!: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VkIj2yKudZ0
